name: Gardulla the Hutt (V)
Lore: 'Well-known as a gambler and a gangster. Gardulla was a former owner of Shmi and Anakin Skywalker, before losing them in a bet to the Toydarian junk dealer, Watto.',
Text: 'During battle, if [Virtual] No Bargain on table, may lose 2 force to cancel a non-[Immune To Sense] interrupt. Once per game during your move phase, may relocate any of your characters here to any site you occupy as a regular move (or vice versa). Immune to attrition < 3.',
